column2: Does the land referred to in P1 apply to the land surveyed in Plan P2? If not, is the
Plain(cid:415)ﬀ en(cid:415)tled to maintain this ac(cid:415)on?
ursuant to leave being granted, an applica(cid:415)on had been made by learned Counsel that

column1: this ma(cid:425)er be referred to a divisional bench of this Court since conﬂic(cid:415)ng views have been
expressed by this Court with regard to the ﬁrst, and more par(cid:415)cularly the second ques(cid:415)on
of law. Accordingly, His Lordship the Chief Jus(cid:415)ce had made an order on 7th June 2023 in
terms of Ar(cid:415)cle 132(3) of the Cons(cid:415)tu(cid:415)on cons(cid:415)tu(cid:415)ng a bench of seven Judges of this
